6. **Limited effectiveness**: Some conventional treatments may not be effective for everyone, or may only provide temporary relief from symptoms.
7. **Overuse of antibiotics**: The overuse and misuse of antibiotics have contributed to the rise of antibiotic-resistant bacteria, making it more challenging to treat infections.
